subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: A configuration directive is a configuration fragment that will be supplied to a component that implements the org.apache.avalon.configuration.Configurable interface. The attributes and content of a configuration element are application specific. The <configuration> element is the root element passed to the component.

subsection.name: Sample XML
subsection.source: <container name="container"> <!-- ... --> <container name="subcontainer"> <!-- ... --> <component name="test2" class="AnotherComponent"> <!-- will be passed into configurable() method --> <configuration attr1="test"> <colour match="false">red</color> </configuration> </component> </container> </container>
